pkgmetadata.longdescription: mitol-django-common---This is the Open Learning Django Common app. It provides common functionality used across all our applications.### Getting started`pip install mitol-django-common`### Configuration- `MITOL_COMMON_USER_FACTORY` - (optional) set to the fully qualified path for a user model factory, otherwise a default based on `django.contrib.auth.models.User` is used
